plays.text: Penalty to Alexandre Daigle 2 minutes for Holding(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Shean Donovan assisted by Wayne Primeau
Penalty to Ken Klee 2 minutes for Tripping Aleksey Morozov
Goal scored by Jan Hrdina assisted by Aleksey Morozov and Mario Lemieux
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Mike Farrell
Penalty to Alexei Kovalev 2 minutes for Obstruction - Tripping Mike Grier
Penalty to Dick Tarnstrom 2 minutes for Hooking Dainius Zubrus
Penalty to Jeff Halpern 2 minutes for Crosschecking Jan Hrdina
Goal scored by Peter Bondra assisted by Kip Miller and Ken Klee
Penalty to Ken Klee 2 minutes for Hooking Mario Lemieux
Goal scored by Mario Lemieux assisted by Dick Tarnstrom and Alexei Kovalev
Penalty to Ville Nieminen 2 minutes for Roughing Sergei Gonchar
Penalty to Wayne Primeau 2 minutes for Hooking Dainius Zubrus
Goal scored by Jeff Halpern assisted by Sergei Gonchar and Kip Miller
Penalty to Jeff Halpern 2 minutes for Tripping Marc Bergevin
Penalty to Jan Hrdina 2 minutes for Tripping Steve Eminger
Penalty to Alexei Kovalev 2 minutes for Hooking Jeff Halpern
